author: Nebula, Alek, & Rai
name: Quantum Space Buddies
description: Adds online multiplayer to the game.

warning.title: Follow these steps before playing multiplayer :
warning.body:
- Disable *all* other mods. (Can heavily affect performance)
- Make sure you are not running any other network-intensive applications.
- Make sure you have forwarded/opened the correct ports. (See the GitHub readme.)
